    A "naive" durable mailbox which uses findAndRemove; it's possible if the actor crashes after consuming a message that the message could be lost.

  16. case class MongoDurableMessage (ownerPath: String, message: Any, sender: ActorRef, _id: ObjectId) extends Product with Serializable

    A container message for durable mailbox messages, which can be easily stuffed into and out of MongoDB.
